If you're donating, please separate your items out already

shelters.notes: 8/31 - Our guests left this morning and arrived safely in Cuero. We are converting the cottage back to be used for Sunday School this Sunday. Vista church is full and no longer in need of donations. The biggest need right now for our area is gift cards for gasoline and local restaurants. Prepaid Visa cards are also useful. We are in contact with our city official and are distributing these cards as needed.

shelters.notes: Clute Intermediate has become a shelter for evacuees. Busing in from northern part of county that is flooding tonight. -8/29, From FB page

Starting 9/1/17 and on Saturday, 9/2/17 people can bring donations to Delmar Fieldhouse, 2020 Mangum Rd., Houston, TX 77092, between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. People wanting to drop off donations should enter the complex on Mangum Street. Signs will be posted.  After Friday & Saturday, Donations will be accepted Sept. 5-8 between the hours of 7 a.m. and 6 p.m., Donations will be accepted starting Sept. 11 during normal business hours, 8 a.m. to 5 p.m.  Beginning Sept. 11, Delmar Fieldhouse will be the sole donation site,and any donations previously made to Butler and Barnett stadiums will be taken there. Donations will be distributed to schools from Delmar Fieldhouse.
